item.title: Liza add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description:
"Do you hate people?
I don't hate them...I just feel better when they're not around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Liza add a quote by Amor Towles
item.description: "...be careful when choosing what you're proud of--because the world has every intention of using it against you." -- Amor Towles

item.title: Liza add a quote by Amor Towles
item.description: "Most people have more needs than wants. That's why they live the lives they do. But the world is run by those whose wants outstrip their needs." -- Amor Towles

item.title: Liza add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I knew I was strong, and maybe like they said, "crazy." But I had this feeling inside of me that something real was there." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Liza add a quote by V.C. Andrews
item.description: "What is normal? Normal is only ordinary; mediocre. Life belongs to the rare, exceptional individual who dares to be different." -- V.C. Andrews

item.title: Liza add a quote by V.C. Andrews
item.description: "Love, in short is the most dangerous emotion human can experience" -- V.C. Andrews

item.title: Liza add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "Man is originally characterized by his "search for meaning" rather than his "search for himself." The more he forgets himself—giving himself to a cause or another person—the more <i>human</i> he is. And the more he is immersed and absorbed in something or someone other than himself the more he really becomes <i>himself</i>." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Liza add a quote by Daisy Whitney
item.description: "I don't need to be any place else, because the music takes me to the only place I want to be right now. To the place where I am and have always been wholly me, the only church I've ever belonged to, the only place I've ever prayed." -- Daisy Whitney

item.title: Liza add a quote by Maurice Sendak
item.description: "A book is really like a lover. It arranges itself in your life in a way that is beautiful." -- Maurice Sendak

item.title: Liza add a quote by Tatiana de Rosnay
item.description: "You get attached to places, you know. Like people, I suppose." -- Tatiana de Rosnay

item.title: Liza add a quote by William Strunk Jr.
Liza add a quote by Matthew Quick
item.description: "When she needed help most, she was abandoned—and only when she offered help to others was she beloved." -- Matthew Quick

item.title: Liza add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "From childhood's hour I have not been. As others were, I have not seen. As others saw, I could not awaken. My heart to joy at the same tone. And all I loved, I loved alone." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Liza add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we least expect it, life sets us a challenge to test our courage and willingness to change; at such a moment, there is no point in pretending that nothing has happened or in saying that we are not yet ready. The challenge will not wait. Life does not look back. A week is more than enough time for us to decide whether or not to accept our destiny." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Liza add a quote by Thornton Wilder
item.description: "Oh, earth, you're too wonderful for anybody to realize you." -- Thornton Wilder

item.title: Liza add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Liza add a quote by Irwin Shaw
item.description: "There are too many books I haven’t read, too many places I haven’t seen, too many memories I haven’t kept long enough." -- Irwin Shaw

item.title: Liza add a quote by Steve Wozniak
item.description: "If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach. And it'll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build. It'll be worth it, I promise." -- Steve Wozniak

item.title: Liza add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up" -- Veronica Roth
